select.if: SELECT t.INDUSTRY_NAME type, t.INDUSTRY_id id, SUM(t.CNUM) value FROM ( SELECT * FROM CMS_XM_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGG_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGS_NUM ) t where t.start_date>=#{startDate} and t.start_date<=#{endDate} GROUP BY t.INDUSTRY_NAME ORDER BY t.INDUSTRY_id ASC

select t.INDUSTRY_NAME type,t.INDUSTRY_id id,SUM(t.CNUM) value from CMS_XM_NUMCMS_ZBGG_NUMCMS_ZBGS_NUM t where t.start_date>=#{startDate} and t.start_date<=#{endDate} group by t.INDUSTRY_ID order by t.INDUSTRY_id asc

select CONCAT(year(t.START_DATE),LPAD(month(t.START_DATE),2,0))+0 time, SUM(cnum) value FROM ( SELECT * FROM CMS_XM_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGG_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGS_NUM ) t where t.start_date>=#{startDate} and t.start_date<=#{endDate} GROUP BY time order by t.start_date asc

select t.AREA_NAME name,sum(t.CNUM) value FROM ( SELECT * FROM CMS_XM_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGG_NUM UNION SELECT * FROM CMS_ZBGS_NUM ) t where t.start_date>=#{startDate} and t.start_date<=#{endDate} GROUP BY t.AREA_NAME order by value desc
